import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"../css/Intro.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Intro(){const fullText="프론트엔드 개발자";// 타이핑 효과 텍스트
const[displayText,setDisplayText]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{let index=0;const interval=setInterval(()=>{setDisplayText(fullText.slice(0,index+1));index++;if(index===fullText.length)clearInterval(interval);},150);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"intro",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{id:"mainTitle",children:"\uC774\uC7AC\uC6A9 \uD3EC\uD2B8\uD3F4\uB9AC\uC624"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"mainDesc",children:displayText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"scrollIcon",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mouse",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wheel"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Scroll Down"})]})]});}export default Intro;
